NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 CASSAVA: I am still consumed by my disappointment, my love. Will we ever find this elusive Eye of the Universe? 2 1 CASSAVA: Daz, I shall busy myself with a change of task for now: I am assisting our friends in returning the lifeforms within the Sanctuary to the surface of Timber Hearth. 3 2 CASSAVA: But once our task is completed, would you kindly join me? I would like to attempt a few more launches powered by the Deep Storm Station. It is.. all I can think to do right now. 4 3 DAZ: Of course, love. I shall voyage to the Deep Storm Station to be by your side now. 5 3 DAZ: Look sunward, Cassava: though we have encountered a disappointing setback, I still have faith our clan will find another way to reach our goals. 6 5 DAZ: Poke, Pye and Clary are already exploring the visiting comet at this very moment! Perhaps we may find an answer to 7 6 CASSAVA: Daz? Did something interrupt your thought? 8 7 CASSAVA: Daz? What's wrong? Daz? Workshop Locked R3 1 Workshop Locked EX2 1,6 DSS CONV1 1,6
